entry.RedBlue: The bone it holds is its key weapon. It throws the bone skillfully like a boomerang to KO targets.
entry.Yellow: Small and weak, this POKéMON is adept with its bone club. It has grown more vicious over the ages.
entry.Gold: It has been seen pounding boulders with the bone it carries in order to tap out messages to others.
entry.Silver: It collects bones from an unknown place. A MAROWAK graveyard exists somewhere in the world, rumors say.
entry.Crystal: Somewhere in the world is a cemetery just for MAROWAK. It gets its bones from those graves.
entry.RubySapphire: MAROWAK is the evolved form of a CUBONE that has overcome its sadness at the loss of its mother and grown tough. This POKéMON’s tempered and hardened spirit is not easily broken.
entry.FireRed: It is small and was originally very weak. Its temperament turned ferocious when it began using bones.
entry.LeafGreen: The bone it holds is its key weapon. It throws the bone skillfully like a boomerang to KO targets.
entry.Emerald: A MAROWAK is the evolved form of a CUBONE that has grown tough by overcoming the grief of losing its mother. Its tempered and hardened spirit is not easily broken.
entry.DiamondPearlPlatinum: From its birth, this savage Pokémon constantly holds bones. It is skilled in using them as weapons.
entry.HeartGold: It has been seen pounding boulders with the bone it carries in order to tap out messages to others.
entry.SoulSilver: It collects bones from an unknown place. Some whisper that a MAROWAK graveyard exists somewhere in the world.
entry.BlackWhiteBlack 2White 2: From its birth, this savage Pokémon constantly holds bones. It is skilled in using them as weapons.
entry.X: It is small and was originally very weak. Its temperament turned ferocious when it began using bones.
entry.Y: The bone it holds is its key weapon. It throws the bone skillfully like a boomerang to KO targets.
entry.Omega RubyAlpha Sapphire: Marowak is the evolved form of a Cubone that has overcome its sadness at the loss of its mother and grown tough. This Pokémon’s tempered and hardened spirit is not easily broken.
entry.Sun: Originally, it was weak and timid. After evolution, its temperament becomes violent, and it begins to wield bones as weapons.
entry.Moon: This Pokémon is out for vengeance on its natural enemy, Mandibuzz. It throws bones like boomerangs to try to take it down.
